titleStmt.title: Mary sitting at Christs feet A sermon preached at the funerall of Mris Mary Swaine, the wife of Mr William Swaine, at Saint Buttolphs without Aldersgate. Declaring her christian life, and comfortable death, for the encouraging of all christian gentlewomen, and others, to walke in the steps of this religious gentlewoman already departed. By Lancelot Langhorne, preacher of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: Langhorne, Lancelot.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for Arthur Iohnson,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through, and some pages marked.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
